comment.author: 8822983@N08
comment._content: I added some tags from APT

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic formed part of a panorama which featured in a harvest pictorial in the Sydney Mail of 30/1/1907 (pp. 284-285)...(this is the closest link I can find to the page!) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=bGpVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=eJUDA... ; if we can believe the Sydney Mail, the pic was taken at Ross brothers' farm, 'Combella', near Wellington...some of the other pics which appear in this Sydney Mail article were evidently taken there as well...but at least one pic appears to have been taken near Mt Canobolas (near Orange) and another was taken at Narromine...I've also discovered that the Sydney Mail tended to pad out their feature articles with photos from their photo archive, so pending further info emerging, I wouldn't be too emphatic re the location/date of all the pics in the Sydney Mail article. Also see - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363537902/
